title: Encore: 'The Forbidden Knot'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This favorite story from season one, starring Mel Rodriguez (The Last Man on Earth, Electric Dreams), is about the importance of being honest and keeping your word... especially when you’re a leader in charge of something big.
